```{r}
summary <- sort(summary(movie$Director),decreasing = T)
A <- data.frame(Director = names(summary), number = summary)
rownames(A) <- NULL
A <- A[-c(1,2),]
A <- A[c(1:20),]
plot_ly(A, labels = Director, values = number, type = "pie") %>% 
  layout(title = "Top Director")

summary <- sort(summary(movie$Type),decreasing = T)
```

#timeline setup
```{r}
movie <- readRDS("~/Desktop/data.rds")

summary <- summary(as.factor(movie$Year));summary
ALL <- data.frame(year = names(summary), number = summary)
ALL <- ALL[-nrow(ALL),]
ALL$year <- as.Date(paste(ALL$year, "01", "01", sep=""), "%Y%m%d")
ALL$year <- as.POSIXlt(ALL$year)
ALL <- xts(ALL[,-1], order.by=ALL[,1])

#dygraph(ALL, main = "New Haven Temperatures", ylab = "Temp (F)")
```

#Timeline 2
```{r}
movie_time <- read.csv("~/Desktop/movie_time.csv")
movie.time <- merge(movie_time,Final,by = "product_productid")
movie.time <- movie.time[,c(1,3,5,7,8,10,13)]
movie.time$newtime <- as.POSIXlt(movie.time$newtime)
movie.time$title.y <- as.character(movie.time$title.y)
movie.time$title.y <- gsub("\\[.*","",movie.time$title.y)
movie.time$title.y <- gsub("\\(.*","",movie.time$title.y)
movie.time$title.y <- gsub("\\~.*","",movie.time$title.y)
movie.time$title.y <- gsub("\\{.*","",movie.time$title.y)
movie.time$title.y <- gsub('[-]','',movie.time$title.y)
saveRDS(movie.time, file="~/Desktop/time.Rds")

#create timeline dataframe
sub <-  movie.time[movie.time$product_productid =="B000005PPB",]
sub <- sub[order(sub$newtime),]

mean <- c()

for (i in 1: dim(sub)[1]){
  
  mean[i] <- mean(sub[1:i,3])

}
mean

sub <- cbind(sub,mean)
data <- xts(sub[,-4], order.by = sub[,4])

#dygraph(data[,3], main = "Review Score Timeline ", ylab = "Score") %>% dyRangeSelector()

dygraph(data[,7], main = "Variation of Average Score", ylab = "Score") %>% dyRangeSelector() %>%  dyOptions(stackedGraph = TRUE)
```
